code: import React from'react';import'./Notifications.css';import icon from'./close-icon.png';import{getLatestNotification}from'./utils';function Notifications(){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"Notifications"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{style:{position:'relative',width:'100%',border:'none',background:'none',textAlign:'right',padding:'0'},"aria-label":"Close",onClick:console.log('Close button has been clicked')},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{src:icon,alt:"Close",styles:{width:'2em',height:'0.1rem'}})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Here is the list of notifications"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("ul",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{data:"default"},"New course available"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{data:"urgent"},"New resume available"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{data:"urgent",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:getLatestNotification()}})));}export default Notifications;
